product1.name: Elegant Pink Flower Vase
product1.description: Add a touch of sophistication to your decor with this elegant pink flower vase featuring an intricate diamond-textured design. Perfect for showcasing flowers or as a standalone decorative piece, it effortlessly enhances any space with its charm and style.
product1.subDescription: A stylish blush-toned vase with a diamond texture, perfect for adding elegance to any space.

product2.name: Textured Elegance Decorative Vase Set
product2.description: Enhance your home décor with this set of stylish decorative vases, crafted from high-quality resin. Featuring a contemporary dimpled texture and soft pastel shades of blush pink, sage green, and ivory white, these lightweight and durable vases are perfect for any setting. Use them to display artificial flowers, dried arrangements, or as standalone decorative accents to bring a modern and serene vibe to your space.
product2.subDescription: Stylish resin vases with a dimpled texture, available in soft pastel tones. Perfect for artificial flowers or as decorative pieces to enhance any space.

product3.name: Textured Modern Flower Vase
product3.description: This vase features a charming textured pattern, bringing a touch of freshness and calm to your living space. Its soft color makes it a perfect match for pastel or neutral-themed interiors.
product3.subDescription: A light textured vase that adds serenity to your decor.

product4.name: Pleated Grace Decorative Vase
product4.description: Add a touch of timeless elegance to your space with the Pleated Grace Decorative Vase. Crafted from durable resin, this vase features a unique pleated design that exudes sophistication. Tied with a rustic jute rope for added charm, it's perfect for holding artificial or dried flowers. Lightweight yet sturdy, this vase makes an ideal centerpiece or a subtle decorative accent for modern and minimalist interiors.
product4.subDescription: Resin vase with a pleated design and rustic jute rope. Ideal for dried or artificial flowers, adding a chic touch to any décor.

product5.name: Geometric Charm Planter Set
product5.description: Bring modern elegance to your indoor garden with this set of geometric planters. Made from durable resin, these lightweight yet sturdy pots feature a unique faceted design and come in a range of soft pastel colors, including gray, white, blue, cream, and peach. Perfect for small plants, succulents, or decorative arrangements, these planters effortlessly add a contemporary touch to any space.
product5.subDescription: Faceted resin planters in pastel shades, ideal for succulents and small plants. Stylish, durable, and perfect for modern décor.
